mapper.select: SELECT a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`lft`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `team` WHERE `parent_uuid` = a.`uuid`) as `childCount`, a.`parent_uuid` as `parentUuid`, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`level` FROM `team` a WHERE `uuid` = #{uuid}

SELECT a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `team` WHERE `parent_uuid` = a.`uuid`) as `childCount` FROM `team` a WHERE a.`parent_uuid` = #{value} ORDER BY `lft` ASC

SELECT `uuid`, `name`, `parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, `lft`, `rht` FROM `team` WHERE `uuid` in
#{item}
SELECT ut.`team_uuid` FROM `user_team` ut JOIN team t ON t.`uuid`=ut.`team_uuid` WHERE ut.`user_uuid`=#{userUuid};
SELECT a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, a.`lft`, a.`rht` FROM `team` a WHERE a.`parent_uuid` = #{parentUuid} ORDER BY a.`lft` ASC limit #{startNum}, 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `team` WHERE `uuid` = #{uuid} AND `lft` > #{lft} AND `rht` < #{rht}
mapper.delete: DELETE a, b, c, d FROM `team` a LEFT JOIN `team_tag` b ON b.`team_uuid` = a.`uuid` LEFT JOIN `user_team` c ON c.`team_uuid` = a.`uuid` WHERE a.`lft` >= #{lft} AND a.`rht` <= #{rht}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, 0 as `childCount` FROM `team` a WHERE a.`lft` <= #{lft} AND a.`rht` >= #{rht} ORDER BY `lft` ASC
